item.description:
GIRL's ONLY EVENT
Any guys who have decided to read past GIRL's ONLY - please don't be affended - we still love and need you!

Valentines Male Bashing & Chocolate Fondue Party - 4th Annual

Whether you have a Valentine's this year or not, I know you have a story to share. Perhaps a slight irritation to air, or maybe a teeny grievance you need to get off your chest...well, come on over for some great laughs and delicious fondue!

We will be collecting anonymous stories, jokes, worst lines, things you'd like to say to "others", bad dates, bad husbands etc. etc. etc.

BYOB

I do have pets in case your allergic.

Please note: Sad to say this will be the last event for Girl Fun. Since changing my other group from "NE Dynamic Sports Fans" to "Funseekers" its opened up the opportunity to plan many events for both men and women, and left Girl Fun in the dust. I will continue to plan some "Girl Only" events through Funseekers and hope you'll join us for those as well as others.

It's been a great four years!!
item.name: GIRLS's ONLY EVENT! Valentines MB & Chocolate Fondue Party
